original_text: Now the acts of Rehoboam, first and last, are they not written in the book of Shemaiah the prophet, and of Iddo the seer concerning genealogies? And there were wars between Rehoboam and Jeroboam continually.
korean_text: 르호보암의 처음부터 끝까지의 행적은 선지자 스마야와 선견자 잇도의 족보책에 기록되지 아니하였느냐 르호보암과 여로보암 사이에 항상 전쟁이 있으니라

sentences.original_text: Now the acts of Rehoboam, first and last
are they not written in the book of Shemaiah the prophet
And there were wars between Rehoboam and Jeroboam
